Sintesa Hotels Group proudly to present the opening of ‘The Sintesa ‘ Jimbaran - Bali, a new concept of upscale hotel in Jimbaran and located on Bali’s southwestern coast is connecting between Jimbaran Bay and Clift (Bukit) of Jimbaran. The Sintesa Jimbaran Bali, designed for natural living with choices of the wellness and lifestyle activities and facilities to deliver ‘a best moment to stay‘.

text.en: The Sintesa Jimbaran – Bali is just 10 km south of the Bali Airport (Denpasar). 'The Sintesa' Jimbaran Bali is a short walk to many of Bali's most famous traditional beach - side Seafood Restaurants and is a close drive by hotel shuttle to Cafés and Bars at Jimbaran Bay and Uluwatu. The Jimbaran region is also home to several world-class hotels and high end villas. Jimbaran is where we enjoy the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay. Hotel’s location is conveniently positioned, is only 15 km away from vibrant area of Kuta and Nusa Dua. The Hotel is easily accessible to the main tourist quarter of Legian and Seminyak Beachs with its world- famous shopping and nightlife venues.

description.en: Jimbaran Bay is one of iconic beaches in the South of Bali. This place is where we can find the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay. Brightly painted traditional Jukung fishing boats dot the white sand in the early morning, the fishermen are coming into shore with last night’s catch.

data.text: This was one of the best hotels I have stayed in. The room was large, the beds very comfortable and the facilities great. And the spa - what a treat. Loved, loved, loved this place. Food was great and the staff were amazing. I would return there in a heartbeat

The staff are amazing!!! They could not have done anymore for me to make my stay as great as it was. From the front desk you are greeted with big smiles and that was the same from all of the staff throughout my stay. The room service to the laundry service and everything in between was excellent.
This is a brand new Jimbaran Hotel and it's really good. The staff is superb and makes every effort to make the stay here comfortable.
Such a lovely atmosphere, quiet and charming with warm and caring staff. The lounge is perfectly designed for small and enjoyable fun or large parties.

meta.en: The Sintesa Jimbaran Resort | Description for Destination

subtitle.en: Jimbaran Bay is one of iconic beaches in the South of Bali. This place is where we can find the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay.

lead.en: Jimbaran Bay is one of iconic beaches in the South of Bali. This place is where we can find the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay.

description_one.en: Brightly painted traditional Jukung fishing boats dot the white sand in the early morning, the fishermen are coming into shore with last night’s catch. Hire a fishing boat to take you out into the bay to give you a glimpse of the village way of life. Visit Kedonganan Fish Market, this daily market sells fresh seafood straight off the boats.

description_two.en: Taste the succulent catches of the day, freshly grilled over coconut husk barbecues when night falls and the beachside restaurants serve up. Dine under the starry skies to the sounds of the waves, the ultimate toes-in-the-sand dining experience.

description.en: Enjoy the finest attributes of contemporary Balinese and Javanese design with modern life style concept and ultimately anticipate the needs of all our guests.
Jimbaran Beach is iconic beaches in the South of Bali. This place is where we can find the majestic sunset emerged all year along the bay.

Taste the succulent catches of the day, freshly grilled coconut husk barbecues when night falls and the beachside restaurants served up. Dine under the starry skies to the sounds of the waves, the ultimate toes-in-the-sand dinning experience.

Known as GWK is a 60 Ha area of cultural park located in Ungasan, Badung Regency or about 10 - 15 minutes driving from The 'Sintesa' Jimbaran. It is devoted to Hindu God Vhisnu, and His mount; Garuda, mythical bird who become His companion.

Brightly painted traditional Jukung fishing boats dot the white sand in the early morning, the fisherman are coming into shore with last night's catch. Visit Kedonganan Fish Market, this daily market sells fresh seafood straight off the boats.

Dreamland beach is located on the Bukit Peninsula, and is one of the most beautiful beaches on the island, renowned for its shore breaks. Dreamland is the expression of hope and dreams come true with its luxurious cliff top views and unique remote island.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat.

Located just 10 km south of the Bali Airport (Denpasar). Hotel's location is conveniently positioned, just 15 minutes drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport and 20 minutes away from vibrant area of Kuta and Nusa Dua.

Often referred as the secret beach, Pandawa is concealed behind high cliffs and overgrown shruberry. As you near Pandawa, you will be greeted by five status carved into the cliffs beside you : Yudhistira, Bima, Arjuna, Nakula and Sadewa, the five brothers PANDAWA in the shadow puppet theater, from which the beach take its name.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat.
Best surfing at Uluwatu Area. It has a fast long pipeline on a shallow reef and having a beautiful Bali's nastier wave. Perfect beach for yoga and professional surfer.

The temple at Uluwatu which is near to 'The Sintesa' Jimbaran was built by the Javanese Hindu Guru Empu Kuturan in the 10th century. The temple at 'the head of the rock stands a top a sheer cliff rising two hundreds feet above the Indian Ocean. The most compeling part of the temple complex however, comes from its nightly kecak and fire dance performances.

subtitle.en: The Sintesa Jimbaran Bali, 206 beautiful appointed guestrooms and suites are available in unique tiers of accommodation which include Superior Room, Deluxe Room, Family Rooms and our Suites Collection.

title.en: The Sintesa Jimbaran Bali, 206 beautiful appointed guestrooms and suites are available in unique tiers of accommodation which include Superior Room, Deluxe Room, Family Rooms and our Suites Collection.

text.en: All room categories embody the finest attributes of contemporary Balinese and Javanese design and ultimately anticipate the needs of all our local & international travelers. This collection of accommodation provides the ultimate in crafted comfort, preferential services and privileges.

subtitle.en: Specially designed for a couple, honeymooner or friends. A home comfort of 35-sqm room, choice twin bed or king bed is an elegant heaven decoration with stylish furnishing and balcony.
A modern appointed accommodation of 48-sqm room with spacious bedroom overlooking Jimbaran Hill. It is subtly blended between modern design and classy Balinese artwork.
Junior Suite is the hotel’s premier accommodation category that truly defines luxury. A 56-sqm accommodation that provide an elevated level of hospitality.

heading.en: All rooms are facilitated with complimentary Wi-Fi, tea and coffee making facilities.

text.en: The 100–sqm suite anticipates every conceivable need of the discerning global traveler, with the latest modern conveniences.
The 97–sqm suites with highlight style, spaciousness and comfort, anticipating you every need.
The 100–sqm suite anticipates every conceivable need of the discerning global traveler, with the latest modern conveniences.

columns: The BARber opens at 7am to 11pm on weekdays and 7am to 1 am on weekends with special live music performance on 8.30pm

Features and Facilities

  • Band Venue
  • Grand Piano Jazz
  • DJ-Booth
  • BARber Shop
  • Billiard Area
  • Cigar Area

Event To Host

  • Music Events
  • Social Events
  • Cocktail Party
  • Pre and Post Wedding Parties
  • Private Party

title.en: All kids start out as scientists, constantly asking ‘Why? What’s that? How does it work?’ Kids experiences at The Sintesa Jimbaran tap into that innate curiosity by introducing our youngest guests to both the natural wonders and the rich cultural traditions of our family-friendly hotel,

text.en: Which also includes outdoor activities to keep youngsters active and inspired , With a diverse collection of vacation activities based on the four pillars of the program – water, land, environmental responsibility and culture – kids are swept away by everything from storytelling, to creative arts & crafts with a dedicated kids club crew at no additional charge to in-house guests.
